html:
** Berenberg sees an increased focus on digitisation after the COVID-19 pandemic, leaving digital transformation at the top of corporations' priorities for the coming decade and beyond

** The broker says this increased focus on digitisation is positive for digital solutions vendors

** "Key industry sectors for our companies are process manufacturing, discrete manufacturing and construction," it says

** Berenberg starts Nemetschek SE NEKG.DE with "hold", as the German software developer is set to go though "a major business model transition, from a perpetual licence to a subscription delivery model" - which the broker says is not attractive enough given the level of execution risk involved

** The brokerage is more positive on Dassault Systemes SE DAST.PA and its Medidata business, initiating the French software company with "buy"

** It is also confident about AVEVA Group's AVV.L engineering business, seeing ESG-focussed digitisation trends playing out strongly in the process manufacturing sector, as it starts the British industrial software provider with "buy"


(Reporting by Ana Cantero)

(( ana.canteroros@thomsonreuters.com ))
